About

Hey there! I'm Ravigopal Kesari and this is my blog.

I'm always looking for a new challenge. Every day something new comes out in the world of design and development and along with that comes new problems to solve. Tackling these problems helps me to grow as a thinker, as a designer, as a developer and as a creative in general.

Through practice, I’ve reach the point where I’ve gain confidence in presenting myself as a photographer. I continue to learn new techniques everyday and getting comfortable with the intricacies of operating the camera. If you’re free, do check out my Flickr photo stream. I spend most of my time reading articles on web or books. Pocket and Kindle are my best friends.

I like to share my thoughts, which happen to be rants of everything around me on Twitter. Follow me @rvgpl?
